trans-unit.source: Accesses the managed version of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael" /> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 存取 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael" /> 演算法的 Managed 版本。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: This algorithm supports key lengths of 128, 192, or 256 bits; defaulting to 256 bits.
trans-unit.target: 此演算法支援 128、 192 或 256 位元; 的金鑰長度預設為 256 位元。

trans-unit.source: This algorithm supports block sizes of 128, 192, or 256 bits; defaulting to 128 bits (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes>-compatible).
trans-unit.target: 此演算法支援 128、 192 或 256 位元; 區塊大小預設為 128 位元 (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes>-相容)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael> algorithm is the predecessor of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael>演算法是的前置項<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes>。

trans-unit.source: You should use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes> class instead of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged>.
trans-unit.target: 您應該使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes>類別而不是<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the entry [The Differences Between Rijndael and AES](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200932) in the .NET Security blog.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文章[Rijndael 之間的差異和 AES](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=200932) .NET 安全性部落格。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt sample data using the `RijndaelManaged` class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何加密和解密使用範例資料`RijndaelManaged`類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new instance of the `RijndaelManaged` class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立的新執行個體`RijndaelManaged`類別。

trans-unit.source: This class is not compliant with the FIPS algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 此類別與 FIPS 演算法不相容。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric decryptor object.
trans-unit.target: 建立對稱解密子物件。

trans-unit.source: The secret key to be used for the symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 秘密金鑰，提供給對稱演算法使用。

trans-unit.source: The key size must be 128, 192, or 256 bits.
trans-unit.target: 金鑰大小必須是 128、192 或 256 位元。

trans-unit.source: The IV to be used for the symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: IV，提供給對稱演算法使用。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael" /> decryptor object with the specified <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.Key" /> and initialization vector (<see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.IV" />).
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael" /> 和初始化向量 (<see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.Key" />)，建立對稱 <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.IV" /> 解密子物件。

trans-unit.source: A symmetric <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael" /> decryptor object.
trans-unit.target: 對稱 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael" /> 解密子物件。

trans-unit.source: This method decrypts an encrypted message created using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged.CreateEncryptor%2A> overload with the same signature.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會解密加密的訊息建立使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged.CreateEncryptor%2A>多載相同的簽章。

trans-unit.source: The `rgbkey` size must be 128, 192, or 256 bits.
trans-unit.target: `rgbkey`大小必須是 128、 192 或 256 位元。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged.CreateDecryptor%2A> method to decrypt messages encoded with the same signature parameter.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged.CreateDecryptor%2A>方法來解密使用相同的簽章參數編碼的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="rgbKey" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rgbKey" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="rgbIV" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rgbIV" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.Mode" /> property is not <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode.ECB" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode.CBC" />, or <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode.CFB" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.Mode" /> 屬性的值不是 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode.ECB" />、<see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode.CBC" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode.CFB" />。

trans-unit.source: The secret key to be used for the symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 秘密金鑰，提供給對稱演算法使用。

trans-unit.source: The key size must be 128, 192, or 256 bits.
trans-unit.target: 金鑰大小必須是 128、192 或 256 位元。

trans-unit.source: The IV to be used for the symmetric algorithm.
trans-unit.target: IV，提供給對稱演算法使用。

trans-unit.source: Creates a symmetric <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael" /> encryptor object with the specified <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.Key" /> and initialization vector (<see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.IV" />).
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael" /> 和初始化向量 (<see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.Key" />)，建立對稱 <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.IV" /> 加密子物件。

trans-unit.source: A symmetric <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael" /> encryptor object.
trans-unit.target: 對稱 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Rijndael" /> 加密子物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged.CreateDecryptor%2A> overload with the same signature to decrypt the result of this method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RijndaelManaged.CreateDecryptor%2A>多載相同的簽章來解密此方法的結果。

trans-unit.source: The `rgbkey` size must be 128, 192, or 256 bits.
trans-unit.target: `rgbkey`大小必須是 128、 192 或 256 位元。

trans-unit.source: The following code examples demonstrates how to encrypt a message using the `CreateEncryptor` method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何加密訊息，使用`CreateEncryptor`方法。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="rgbKey" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rgbKey" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="rgbIV" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rgbIV" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.Mode" /> property is not <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode.ECB" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode.CBC" />, or <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode.CFB" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.Mode" /> 屬性的值不是 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode.ECB" />、<see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode.CBC" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.CipherMode.CFB" />。

trans-unit.source: Generates a random initialization vector (<see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.IV" />) to be used for the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 產生要使用於該演算法的隨機初始化向量 (<see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.IV" />)。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to generate a random IV when none is specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法時未指定，產生隨機的 IV。

trans-unit.source: Generates a random <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.Key" /> to be used for the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 產生要使用於該演算法的隨機 <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.Key" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to generate a random key when none is specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法時未指定產生的隨機金鑰。
